945:3: sarveṇa bhāvena gurau praṇamya kleśaprahāṇāya vanaṃ jagāma||1||

945:22: puraṃ vidhāyānuvidhāya daṇḍaṃ mitrāṇi saṃgṛhya ripūn vigṛhya|

945:27: panthānmāryaṃ paramaṃ didṛkṣuḥ śamaṃ yayau kiṃcidupāttacakṣuḥ||13||

945:29: yasmāttu mokṣāya sa pātrabhūtastasmānmanaḥ svātmani saṃjahāra||14||

945:33: athāśuciṃ duḥkhamanityamasvaṃ nirātmakaṃ caiva cikāya kāyam||16||

945:40: yataśca saṃskāragataṃ viviktaṃ na kārakaḥ kaścana vedako vā|

945:43: tattatpratītya prabhavanti bhāvā nirātmakaṃ tena viveda lokam||21||
945:44: tataḥ sa vātaṃ vyajanādivoṣṇe kāṣṭhāśritaṃ nirmathanādivāgnim|
945:49: mārgāṅgamātaṅgavatā balena śanaiḥ śanaiḥ kleśacamūṃ jagāhe||24||
945:50: sa smṛtyupasthānamayaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ śatrūn viparyāsamayān kṣaṇena|
945:54: athātmadṛṣṭiṃ sakalāṃ vidhūya caturṣu satyeṣvakathaṃkathaḥ san|
945:58: dārḍhyāt prasādasya dhṛteḥ sthiratvāt satyeṣvasaṃmūḍhatayā caturṣu|

945:64: śāntaṃ śivaṃ nirjarasaṃ virāgaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ paśyati yaśca dharmam|

945:67: anusmaran paśyati cittadṛṣṭyā maitryā ca śāstrajñatayā ca tuṣṭaḥ||33||
945:69: anusmaran paśyati kāyasākṣī maitryā ca sarvajñatayā ta tuṣṭaḥ||34||

945:73: tataḥ sa kāyaṃ samavekṣamāṇaḥ sāraṃ vicintyāṇvapi nopalebhe||36||
945:74: sa kāmarāgapratighau sthirātmā tenaiva yogena tanū cakāra|

945:87: sukhaṃ vigāhyāpsviva dharmakhinnaḥ prāpyeva cārtha vipulaṃ daridraḥ||43||
945:88: tatrāpi taddharmagatān vitarkān guṇāguṇe ca prasṛtān vicārān|
945:90: kṣobhaṃ prakurvanti yathormayo hi dhīraprasannāmbuvahasya sindhoḥ|

945:97: prītau tu tatrāpi sa doṣadarśī yathā vitarkeṣvabhavattathaiva||48||
945:98: prītiḥ parā vastuni yatra yasya viparyayāttasya hi tatra duḥkham|

945:101: upekṣakaḥ sa smṛtimān vyahārṣid dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratilabhya dhīraḥ||50||

945:147: saṃbuddhaṃ daśabalinaṃ bhiṣakpradhānaṃ trātāraṃ punarapi cāsmi saṃnatastam||73||
